data.name: plAccessKeyId.Help
data.value: Obtain your access key id and secret access key on "AWS Access Identifiers" page after registering Simple Storage Service on Amazon

data.name: plSecretAccessKey.Help
data.value: Obtain your access key id and secret access key on "AWS Access Identifiers" page after registering Simple Storage Service on Amazon

data.name: plBucket.Help
data.value: Select a bucket to store your files, Every file stored in Amazon S3 is contained in a bucket. Buckets partition the namespace of objects stored in Amazon S3 at the top level. please note bucket names must be unique across all of Amazon S3

data.name: plAddBucket.Help
data.value: Add a new bucket, please note you get a "409 Conflict" error if the bucket name is already used by other peopels.

data.name: NoDotInBucket.Text
data.value: Dot(.) in bucket name is not alllowed

data.name: SchedulerInstalled.Text
data.value:
The scheduler to upload local pictures to amazon s3 server is already installed.

To change its frequency, search for "AWSOperationScheduler" in Host - Schedule and alter it by your self.

data.name: SchedulerNotInstalled.Text
data.value: The scheduler to upload local pictures to amazon s3 server is not installed, click Finish button to install it.

data.name: plBatchQuantity.Help
data.value: The number of items to be transfered each time

data.name: plShortUrl.Help
data.value: Choose this option to exclude $portal root/UltraPhotoGallery/ from picture url when transfer to Amazone S3

data.name: Instructions.Text
data.value: A few presentations require images to be on local server disk, so these images will not be available after transfering to Amazon S3 server, please ensure you read the "Integrate with Amazon s3" chapter in the user guide before continue.
